Name: alcoholic neuropathy
Definition: An agammaglobulinemia that is that has_material_basis_in a mutation in the Bruton's tyrosine kinase (BTK) gene on the X chromosome resulting in X-linked agammaglobulinemia type 1

Name: polyneuropathy due to drug
Definition: An agammaglobulinemia that is that has_material_basis_in a mutation in the Bruton's tyrosine kinase (BTK) gene on the X chromosome resulting in X-linked agammaglobulinemia type 1

Name: critical illness polyneuropathy
Definition: An autosomal dominant cerebellar ataxia that is characterized by slow degeneration of the hindbrain and has_material_basis_in expansion of CAG triplet repeats (glutamine) in the ATXN3 gene.

Name: chronic inflammatory demyelinating polyneuritis
Definition: An organ system cancer located in the hematological system that is characterized by uncontrolled cellular proliferation in blood

Name: paraneoplastic polyneuropathy
Definition: A sarcoma that has_material_basis in lymphatic tissue.
